name: Tic-Tac-Toe (Guillermo Gonzalez)
description:
Tic-Tac-Toe: The Two-Player X & O Game

Gameplay: Click on the Grid

Note: Originally, I was working on a minimax algorthm to allow the option to play the computer; but I spent two whole days trying to figure it out only to make a bot as good as just playing randomly.
